mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId , s.students_id AS studentsId , s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title AS title , b.content AS content , IFNULL(Date_format(b.update_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), "-") AS updateAt , Date_format(b.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, b.cnt AS cnt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s on b.students_id = s.students_id
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = now() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
